title: Staggering Smite
content:
Staggering Smite Lv4 Evocation If the attack hits, deals an extra 4d6 psychic damage and the target must succeed on a Wis. save or have a disadvantage. Attack roll, WIS Save, : Normal weapon range, Concentration Bonus Action +Lv4 Spell Slot

Staggering Smite

If the attack hits, deals an extra 4d6 psychic damage and the target must succeed on a Wis. save or have a disadvantage.

Attack roll, WIS Save, : Normal weapon range, Concentration

Staggering Smite is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Staggerin
